attributes.background: the power companies are constantly raising prices by huge amounts, this time npower by  5 times the rate of inflation, our wages don't go up that much. they need to be held to account, im against privatisation but think utilities have too much of a monopoly and stranglehold  over the common person

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
